SEARCH
Package Parliament

Class PresidentOfIndia

java.lang.Object
Parliament.PresidentOfIndia
public class PresidentOfIndia extends Object
The PresidentOfIndia class provides methods to display information about various key positions and entities related to the Indian government, including the President of India, Vice President, Prime Minister, Council of Ministers, Governors, Lt. Governors and Administrators, Chief Ministers, Judges of the Supreme Court, Chiefs of Armed Forces, Members of Parliament, and MLAs/MLCs.

Author: Vinayak Nishad
Date: 29 July 2024
Rollno : 56
Batch : 3
Class : MCA PART- I
Version: 1.0

This class offers a menu-driven interface to interact with information related to the Indian political structure. The user can select various options to view detailed information about different governmental roles and positions.

The class relies on the Scanner class for user input and displays information using various methods.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PresidentOfIndia

      public PresidentOfIndia()

  • Method Details

    • president

      public void president()
      Displays the main menu for the President of India section, providing options to view details about key positions and entities within the Indian government.

      The menu includes options to view information about the Vice President, Prime Minister, Council of Ministers, Governors, Lt. Governors and Administrators, Chief Ministers, Judges of the Supreme Court, Chiefs of Armed Forces, Members of Parliament, and MLAs/MLCs. Users can select an option to view specific details or return to the main menu.

    • vicePresident

      public void vicePresident()
      Displays information about the Vice President of India.

      Provides contact details including the address, phone number, and email of the Vice President.

    • primeMinister

      public void primeMinister()
      Displays information about the Prime Minister of India.

      Provides contact details including the address, phone number, and fax number, as well as links to official social media profiles.

    • councilOfMinisters

      public void councilOfMinisters()
      Displays information about the Council of Ministers.

      Provides details about the Prime Minister and Cabinet Ministers, including their respective ministries.

    • governors

      public void governors()
      Displays information about the Governors of Indian states.

      Provides a list of states along with their respective Governors.

    • ltGovernorsAndAdministrators

      public void ltGovernorsAndAdministrators()
      Displays information about the Lieutenant Governors and Administrators.

      This method currently provides a placeholder message.

    • chiefMinisters

      public void chiefMinisters()
      Displays information about Chief Ministers of Indian states.

      This method currently provides a placeholder message.

    • judgesOfSupremeCourt

      public void judgesOfSupremeCourt()
      Displays information about the Judges of the Supreme Court of India.

      This method currently provides a placeholder message.

    • chiefsOfArmedForces

      public void chiefsOfArmedForces()
      Displays information about the Chiefs of Armed Forces.

      This method currently provides a placeholder message.

    • membersOfParliament

      public void membersOfParliament()
      Displays information about Members of Parliament (MPs).

      This method currently provides a placeholder message.

    • mlasAndMlcs

      public void mlasAndMlcs()
      Displays information about MLAs (Members of Legislative Assembly) and MLCs (Members of Legislative Council).

      Provides a list of states and links to official websites where users can find information about MLAs and MLCs.
